description:
`bigip_ltm_virtual_address` Configures Virtual Server

For resources should be named with their "full path". The full path is the combination of the partition + name of the resource. For example /Common/virtual_server.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

AdvertizeRoute.description: Enabled dynamic routing of the address ( In versions prior to BIG-IP 13.0.0 HF1, you can configure the Route Advertisement option for a virtual address to be either Enabled or Disabled only. Beginning with BIG-IP 13.0.0 HF1, F5 added more settings for the Route Advertisement option. In addition, the Enabled setting is deprecated and replaced by the Selective setting. For more information, please look into KB article https://support.f5.com/csp/article/K85543242 ).

Arp.description: Enable or disable ARP for the virtual address.

AutoDelete.description: Automatically delete the virtual address with the virtual server.

ConnLimit.description: Max number of connections for virtual address.

Enabled.description: Enable or disable the virtual address.

IcmpEcho.description: Specifies how the system sends responses to ICMP echo requests on a per-virtual address basis.

TrafficGroup.description: Specify the partition and traffic group.
